tune.name: Michael Taylor's Jig
tune.author: Mikael Georgii
tune.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 6/8
    \key bes \major

    \partial 8 f8 |
    d8 bes c d ees e |
    f8 g a bes c d |
    c8 g d' c g d' |
    c4. c8 bes g |
    \break

    a8 f bes a f bes |
    a8 g f ees d c |
    bes8 c d g d g |
    f4. ~ f8 ees c |
    \bar "||" \break

    d8 bes c d ees e |
    f8 g a bes c d |
    c8 g d' c g d' |
    c4. c8 bes g |
    \break

    a8 f bes a f bes |
    a8 g f ees d c |
    bes8 c d c bes a |
    bes4. r8 c bes |
    \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      a8 f g a bes b |
      c8 b c d c a |
      bes8 c d f d g |
      f8 d ees f g bes |
      \break

      bes8 g bes c g cis |
      d8 bes f d ees f |
      g8 ees g a f a |
    } \alternative { {
      bes4. bes8 c, bes |
    } {
      bes'4. ~ bes4
    } } \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      bes4. bes/f | bes bes/d | c:m7/ees g:7/d | c:m c:7/e |
      f4.:7 f:7/c | f f:7/a | bes g:7/b | f f:7/a |

      bes4. bes/f | bes bes/d | c:m/ees g:7/d | c:m c:7/e |
      f4.:7 f:7/c | f:7 f:7/a | c:m f:7 | bes s8 c4:7 |

      f4. f/c | f2. | bes | bes/d |
      c4.:m/ees e:dim | bes/d g:7 | c:m7 f:7 | bes c:7 | bes
    }
  }
>>
